synopsis.text: In February, Koyomi Araragi notices disturbing changes happening to his body, including losing his reflection, after studying for college entrance exams. These changes follow the recent incident with Nadeko Sengoku, which was secretly resolved by con artist Deishu Kaiki. Seeking answers, Koyomi consults the vampire Shinobu Oshino, who advises he contact immortal oddity specialist Yozuru Kagenui. Along with her doll-like companion Yotsugi Ononoki, Kagenui examines Koyomi and determines his vampiric abilities from Shinobu are causing him to lose his humanity. She gives him a difficult choice - either abstain from using these abilities or become a true immortal vampire, losing his human identity forever. With graduation approaching, Koyomi faces a crisis over his inexplicable transformation. The mysterious changes could represent retribution for his past exploits. To decide his future, Koyomi turns to the oddity experts for help in understanding what is happening to both his body and his very self.
